content: k = knit k2tog = knit 2 together ssk = slip slip knit slip 2 stitches knit-wise one at a time to your right needle then return the now- turned stitches back to the left needle knit them both together through the back loop decreasing 1 this is a left leaning decrease st s = stitch es congratulations you now have your very own fairy door now the fairies will have somewhere to stay when they visit your yard you have my permission to sell any fairy doors you make but please credit me as the designer for pattern support simply pm me on ravelry or visit my knit peg dolls group 3
